1.content: Willie says "Okay, who do you want to hear about?"
1.title: Welcome to Anthro Gulch

11.content: Ah, the trick shooter Sam Cougar, He used arrive in town to hold a show of trick shooting for charatable events, he raised money for causes from saving an orphanage or a school and sometimes he keeps a little for himself just to keep food on the table, but an outlaw masquaraded as him robbed a train and now he vows to find the real culpret and clear his name but it ain't easy because the Federal Marshal is after him. Will he find the real robber or will he meet the hangmans noose?
11.title: Sam Cougar

111.content:
Wanted: Dead or Alive, that's what the posters say of me sense whoever framed me for train robbery. My name Sam Cougar, I'm a trickshot performer. I do this to raise money for charity or used to be. I shoot two pistols to verious targets, from bottles to bullseye targets, sometimes moving targets.

I entered the town incognito to avoid being spotted by the sheriff or any of his deputies because my stomech is growling something fearce and I needed food fast so I headed towards the Inn, it was a nice morning, I could've enjoyed it more if not for the price on my head. Everyone passed me said "Morning stranger." As I headed towards the Inn, I saw one of the deputies sitting by the entrance "Morning." He said but a wind blew on my wig and he identified me from there "My god, Sam Cougar." he began to whistle loud enough to wake the dead "HEY SHERIFF! IT'S SAM COUGAR!" I rushed into the Inn where I spotted
111.title: Begin

choices: My stomech rumbles, I'm still hungrey
1111.content: I spotted an elephant girl within a nice big crowd, I was hoping to blend in with the crowd but when the deputy dashed in with the sheriff, a bison morph, he apotted me without trouble, "There he is sheriff." The sheriff said "You have a lot of nerve coming into town Cougar, you know you're a wanted outlaw now I have to take you to jail. but I heard "Wait! Nobody hurt him! I know that Feline! He's Sam Cougar!" It was the elephant girl, I remember seeing her when I did that charity show saving the school for African and Asian immigrant children from closing almost a year ago.The Sheriff shook his head "Listen Lady." He said "You don't know..." Before the sheriff finished his sentance, she swung her mighty trunk and knocked the Sheriff off his feet. "Don't talk back to a woman!" She said "Especially a woman whose 18 feet tall!" She took her trunk and gently wrapped it around my paw "You OK?" She asked "I can take you to my room where it's safe."
1111.title: An elephant morph

choices: "Can we wait 'till we're somewhere more private?"
11112.content:
Note for Amanda: I don't mind how the story is told as long as you keep it in prosepctive.

My stomech rumbles and I felt weak from hunger and she notices it.

"Maybe I should get you something to eat." she said "My treat"

I ordered bacon and eggs with a glass of orange juice, I was so hungrey I ate ravenously.

She kept her eye on him but kept her trunk pointed away from his breakfast.

"How have you been?" She asked mildly

I swallowed and said
11112.title: My stomech rumbles, I'm still hungrey

choices: The Federal Marshal arrived and he's searching the Inn
A lynch mob is after you
111122.content:
I looked around and noticed that most of the people are staring at us, even the elephant girl noticed it one even held up a wanted poster of me, "Umm," I began to say "Can we wait 'till we're someeheere more private? Right now we're attracting too much attention." The elephant girl helps with her truck and escorts you to her room and without incidentt went inside, you say "Thanks, Miss uhh." "Elephantine." She says, "My name's Virginia Elephantine but just call me Virginia." You say "Okay Virginia." Virginia says "Did I see a wanted poster of you out there?" You nodded, Virginia said "What happened, you used to be my hero." You sighed "A month ago, some outlaw masquaded as me and robbed a train, he stole a fortune in gold." Virginia said "You told them you didn't do it?" You said "Tried to, but there were too many witnesses saying otherwise. That's why the sheriff is after me."
Suddenly there was a commotion outside in the Inn.
111122.title: "Can we wait 'till we're somewhere ...

12.content: Virginia is an African Elephant, an immigrant from the Dark Continent, you could refer to her as a 'big beautiful woman' she certainly loves to eat, as long as the food in question is vegetarian. She seems to have a troubled past as asking her about her past seems to provoke a tirade, however with those she considers her friends she is indeed a 'True Blue' loyal to the very end, she seems to be at the crossroads, her Mother's herd wants her to return to Africa, but Virginia wants to stay in the States...Will she be obey her family or her heart?
12.title: Virginia Elephantine

121.content:
Virginia woke up, she had taken the largest bed at the inn and even that was a bit small for her 18 foot body, The Elephant Woman yawned sleepily and hefted herself out of the bed.

She looked at herself in the mirror, she had dark gray skin and dark green eyes, they said an elephant born with green eyes is born a psychic, she also had long brown hair tied in a French braid that went to the small of her back, she had no tusks an unusual feature that made her wonder if she was part Indian Elephant.

It was time for breakfast and she was hungry! She changed into her work close and headed downstairs.

There wasn't much in the way of vegetarian foods, out on the frontier most of the inns catered to the carnivore and omnivore population, but there were a few good things, Virginia ordered a massive bowl of porridge with a large pitcher of milk. and a heaping helping of brown sugar to go on top

One time she wanted banana slices on her porridge she just got strange looks from the natives as Bananas were an African staple and most of the Yanks had never even heard of the fruit!

Virginia had to carefully lift the pitcher of milk by the handle and bring it to her mouth to drink as she had learned the hard way that it is considered very impolite in North American society to drink with your nose.

Virginia started digging into her breakfast suddenly there was a loud noise! Everyone turned around and saw...
121.title: Breakfast

choices: Sam's stomach rumbles, he needs food badly!
1211.content:
It was a Cougar, but not just any Cougar, it was Sam Cougar who many, many months ago helped her save the school for African and Asian immigrant children from being closed.

"Wait!" She said "No body hurt him! I know that Feline! He's Sam Cougar!"

The Sheriff, a Bison Morph shook his head

"Listen Lady." He said "You don't know..."

Virginia however just swung her mighty trunk and knocked the Sheriff off his feet!

"Don't talk back to a woman!" She said "Especially a woman whose 18 feet tall!"

She took her trunk and gently wrapped it around Sam's paw

"You OK?" She asked "I can take you to my room where it's safe."
1211.title: A Cougar Anthro

choices: "Can we wait till we're somewhere more private?"
12112.content:
Sam's belly rumbled he seemed weak with hunger...

"Maybe I should get you something to eat." Virginia said "My treat"

(Author's Note: Hertz, I'm assuming in this universe meat,milk and eggs comes from regular non-Anthro animals...Am I right, am I wrong, I mean it would be kind of creepy if they were eating other intelligent animals)

Sam ordered bacon and eggs with a glass of orange juice...He ate ravenously.

Virginia kept her eye on him but kept her trunk pointed away from his breakfast as the smell of meat made her nauseous.

"How have you been?" She asked mildly

Sam swallowed and said
12112.title: Cougar Needs Food Badly!

choices: The Federal Marshal arrived, he's searching the inn
A lynch mob is after Sam
121122.content:
Sam looked around and noticed most people were staring at him.

"Um..." He said Can we wait 'till we're somewhere more private? Right now we're attracting too much attention."

I agreed I helped him up to my room once inside he said "Thanks Miss Uh..."

"Elephantine." I said "Miss Virginia Elephantine but just call me Virginia."

Sam said "OK Virginia."

I asked "Did I see a wanted poster of you out there?"

Sam nodded

"What happened to you?"I asked "You used to be my hero!"

Sam sighed "A month ago some outlaw masqueraded as me and robbed a train, he stole a fortune in gold."

I said "You told them you didn't do it?"

"Sam said "I tried to, but there were too many witnesses saying otherwise, that's why the sheriff is after me."

Suddenly there was a commotion inside the inn
121122.title: In the Room

13.content:
Anthro Gulch has had many dangerous outlaws, but none of them were more dangerous than Bartholomew Simian, or Silverback Bart as everyone called him. He was a silverback gorilla anthro who was wanted for train robber, bank robbing, arson, murder and stealing bananas. What made him dangerous was that he wielded three guns at once as he had hands for feet. Even other outlaws feared Silverback Bart and had good reason to. The ape man was known to murder and steal from other bandits. They thought nobody could stop him.

But we'll see about that won't we.
13.title: Silverback Bart

info.brief_description: The west is wilder than you think with anthros.
info.description: You see a cabin in the desert with a front porch, on it is two chairs one of them is a bobcat morph wearing western duds, his hat is covering his eyes and wakes up and sees you "Well howdy stranger, new to the parts arn't you?" He says "Name's Bobcat Willie, come on over and sit a spell, I promise not to bite." You sit down on the other chair "There you go," Willie says "I heard stories around these parts from differemt points of view, just tell me who you want to hear about."
